basic-rights.summary: Provides various freedoms like speech, expression, etc.

fundamental_rights.title: Right to Equality
fundamental_rights.description: Guarantees equality before the law and equal protection of the laws within the territory of India.

fundamental_rights.title: Prohibition of Discrimination
fundamental_rights.description: Prohibits discrimination on grounds of religion, race, caste, sex, or place of birth.

fundamental_rights.title: Access to Public Places
fundamental_rights.description: Ensures no citizen is denied access to shops, public restaurants, hotels, and places of public entertainment.

fundamental_rights.title: Special Provisions for Women and Children
fundamental_rights.description: Allows the State to make special provisions for the advancement of women and children.

fundamental_rights.title: Right to Freedom of Speech and Expression
fundamental_rights.description: Guarantees the right to express one's thoughts and opinions freely.

fundamental_rights.title: Right to Assemble Peacefully
fundamental_rights.description: Allows citizens to assemble peacefully without arms.

fundamental_rights.title: Right to Form Associations
fundamental_rights.description: Grants the right to form associations or unions.

fundamental_rights.title: Right to Move Freely
fundamental_rights.description: Ensures the right to move freely throughout the territory of India.

fundamental_rights.title: Right to Practice any Profession
fundamental_rights.description: Guarantees the right to practice any profession or to carry on any occupation, trade, or business.

fundamental_rights.title: Protection in Respect of Conviction
fundamental_rights.description: Provides protection against double jeopardy and self-incrimination.

fundamental_rights.title: Right to Life and Personal Liberty
fundamental_rights.description: Guarantees the right to life and personal liberty, ensuring no person is deprived of these rights except according to the procedure established by law.

honorable_mentions.title: Right to Equality in Public Employment
honorable_mentions.description: Ensures equality of opportunity in matters of public employment and prohibits discrimination in employment on grounds of religion, race, caste, sex, descent, place of birth, or any of them.

articles.description: Guarantees freedom of conscience and the right to freely profess, practice, and propagate religion.
Provides the right to manage religious affairs.
